text: Saidi Juma Makula (born 1 August 1994) is a Tanzanian long distance runner who specialises in the marathon. He competed in the men's marathon event at the 2016 Summer Olympics where he finished in 43rd place with a time of 2:17:49. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Tanzanian male long-distance runners Category:Tanzanian male marathon runners Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Tanzania Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Tanzania
title: Saidi Makula
